text:
@realDonaldTrump @lgutwein99_31 Every American should be afforded the opportunity to vote by mail, especially during this Pandemic!! 100,000 American dead already from #coronavirus and incompetence!!
Don't buy the "fraud" LIE from ppl who are afraid of your vote/voice!!

#VoteByMail
